ygData.subject: Raise faction with Freeport Guards
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, I m a lvl 14 Troll SK on the Innoruuk Server, and I heard that we can improve our faction standing with the freeport guards by completing some
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone,

I'm a lvl 14 Troll SK on the Innoruuk Server, and I heard that we can
improve our faction standing with the freeport guards by completing some
quests given by some NPCs in the underground tunnels.

Who should i talk to in order to get the quests and where are the NPCs
located? I went to the tunnel today but no NPCs were willing to give me any
quests. I worship Cazic Thule...is that the reason the NPCs won't give me
any quests?

Thanks in advance,
Squig
on Innoruuk Server
